Name: BIFMA LEVEL
Description: Certifies furniture products based on environmental impact, health and wellness, and social responsibility criteria.

Name: Blue Angel
Description: Guarantees that a product meets high environmental standards, including protecting consumers' health.

Name: Bluesign
Description: Products are responsibly manufactured using safer chemicals and fewer resources, including less energy, in production.

Name: Carbon Neutral by Carbon Trust
Description: Products reduce their carbon footprint year after year and any outstanding emissions are offset."

Name: Carbon Trust Logo
Description: Reducing CO2 products reduce their carbon footprint year after year. Certified by the Carbon Trust.

Name: Carbonfree Certified
Description: Determines the carbon footprint of the product and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

Name: CarbonNeutral product by Climate Impact Partners
Description: Measures all the emissions created in the product’s manufacture, makes internal reductions and offsets the remainder.

Name: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner
Description: Verifies the product’s carbon footprint was calculated, is continuously reduced and remaining emissions were offset.

Name: Compact by Design (Amazon developed)
Description: Products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

Name: Cradle to Cradle Certified
Description: Products are made with safer materials and responsible processes to positively impact people and our planet. Includes Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Platinum levels.

Name: ECOLOGO
Description: Certified products meet standards that can reduce the environmental impact of one or more stages of the product lifecycle.

Name: ENERGY STAR Most Efficient
Description: Recognizes the best of ENERGY STAR certified products with highest efficiency and maximum carbon reductions."

Name: EPA Safer Choice
Description: U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

Name: EPEAT
Description: Products are assessed against criteria including energy use and have a reduced sustainability impact across their lifecycle. Includes Silver and Gold ratings.

Name: EU Organic
Description: Products have zero or minimal chemical pesticides or fertilizers, support animal welfare and non-genetically modified standards.

Name: EWG Verified
Description: Products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

Name: Fair for Life
Description: Certifies for fair trade and more socially and environmentally responsible supply chains.

Name: Fair Rubber
Description: Products contain natural rubber that is certified as fairly traded according to social and environmental criteria.

Name: Fair Trade Certified
Description: Products are made according to standards that promote safety, sustainability, and empowerment in the workplace.

Name: Fairtrade International
Description: Products are produced in line with ethical and environmental standards, including supporting farmers to tackle climate change challenges.

Name: Global Organic Textile Standard
Description: Certifies each step of the organic textile supply chain against strict ecological and social standards."

Name: Global Recycled Standard
Description: Products are made with at least 50% recycled content and meet social, environmental, and chemical requirements.

Name: Green Seal Logo
Description: Green Seal certified products have reduced climate and environmental impacts at one or more stages of their lifecycle.

Name: GreenCircle Certified: Certified Energy Savings
Description: Verifies product energy savings of over 10% in the use-phase compared to similar products."

Name: GreenCircle Certified: Certified Environmental Facts Label
Description: Verifies product carbon footprint reduction in the raw material or manufacturing stage."

Name: GreenCircle LCA Optimized
Description: "GreenCircle Certified: Life Cycle Assessment Optimized verifies reductions in product life cycle impacts through product or manufacturing improvements."

Name: GreenCircle Recycled Content
Description: GreenCircle Certified: Recycled Content verifies a product is made of at least 50% recycled material."

Name: ISCC PLUS
Description: ISCC PLUS certified products are created using raw materials like recycled plastics and bio-based materials, which can reduce fossil fuel consumption.

Name: Leather Working Group
Description: Leather Working Group certification promotes more-responsible leather production and is committed to driving positive environmental change.

Name: Made Safe
Description: MADE SAFE certifies products made without known toxic chemicals, by prohibiting substances that harm human health or the environment.

Name: Natrue
Description: Natrue certified cosmetics are made from naturally sourced ingredients.

Name: Nordic Swan Ecolabel
Description: Nordic Swan Ecolabel certified products meet requirements on chemical usage, resource consumption, greenhouse gas emissions, and biodiversity.

Name: OEKO-TEX MADE IN GREEN
Description: OEKO-TEX MADE IN GREEN products are tested for harmful substances and made in safer workplaces with reduced environmental impacts.

Name: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100
Description: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to avoid those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

Name: Organic Blended Content Standard logo
Description: Organic Content Standard Blended products included in the program are made with at least 50% organically grown materials.

Name: Organic Content Standard 100
Description: Organic Content Standard 100 products are made with at least 95% organically grown materials.

Name: Plant-Based Fiber Blended
Description: Plant-Based Fiber Blended (Amazon developed) products are made with at least 50% plant-based content and produced in a way that restricts the use of harmful chemicals.

Name: Pre-owned Certified
Description: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics (Amazon-developed Certification) products are inspected, cleaned, and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

Name: Preowned Certified Fashion
Description: Pre-owned Certified: Fashion (Amazon-developed Certification) products have been previously owned. Buying pre-owned instead of new can reduce greenhouse gas emissions, the use of fossil fuels and water, and waste to landfill.

Name: Rainforest Alliance logo
Description: Rainforest Alliance’s seal stands for more-sustainable farming methods that help improve farmer livelihoods & mitigate climate change.

Name: Recycled Claim Standard
Description: Recycled Claim Standard Blended products included in the program use materials made from at least 50% recycled content.

Name: Recycled Claim Standard 100
Description: Recycled Claim Standard 100 products use materials made from at least 95% recycled content.

Name: Recycled Content Certification for Electrical and Electronic Equipment
Description: Recycled Content Certification for Electrical and Electronic Equipment products have at least 10-50% recycled content, based on product type and environmental impact.

Name: Regenerative Organic Certified
Description: Regenerative Organic Certified products meet standards for soil health and land management, animal welfare, and social fairness.

Name: Responsible Wool Standard
Description: Responsible Wool Standard wool is from farms that support animal welfare and responsible land management practices.

Name: Soil Association
Description: Soil Association certifies organic products and is a Certification Body for the COSMOS-standard, which ensures products are genuine organic or natural cosmetics.

Name: TCO Certified
Description: TCO Certified identifies IT products that are independently assessed for lower environmental and social impact, safer chemicals, and circular design.

Name: The Forest Stewardship Council
Description: Certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

Name: U.S. EPA Design for the Environment
Description: Certifies disinfectants that meet the Environmental Protection Agency's strict standards for human and environmental health.

Name: US Cotton Trust Protocol
Description: U.S. Cotton Trust Protocol promotes farmers’ use of environmentally and socially responsible practices in growing more sustainable cotton.

Name: USDA Organic
Description: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

Name: WaterSense
Description: WaterSense, a voluntary label from the US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), identifies products that meet criteria from the EPA for water-efficiency and performance.

Name: BCorp Certified
Description: description goes here
